mapper.insert: insert into hotels (hotel_name, hotel_img, username, hotel_addr,hotel_area, hotel_info) values (#{hotel_name}, #{hotel_img}, #{username}, #{hotel_addr}, #{hotel_area}, #{hotel_info})
insert into rooms (room_type, room_img,price, hotel_seq) values (#{room_type},#{room_img},#{price},#{hotel_seq})
insert into comments(user_comment,rating, userid, room_seq) values (#{user_comment}, #{rating}, #{userid}, #{room_seq})
insert into reservations (checkin_date, checkout_date, userid, room_seq, hotel_seq, payment) values (#{checkin_date}, #{checkout_date}, #{userid}, #{room_seq}, #{hotel_seq}, #{payment})
mapper.select: select d.* from (select a.price , a.hotel_name, a.hotel_seq, b.hotel_img, b.rating, b.hotel_addr, a.room_seq from (select min(r.price) price, h.hotel_name, r.hotel_seq, r.room_seq from hotels h join rooms r on h.hotel_seq = r.hotel_seq group by hotel_seq) a join (select round(avg(c.rating)*1,2) rating, h.hotel_seq, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_img, h.hotel_addr from hotels h join comments c join rooms r on c.room_seq = r.room_seq group by hotel_seq order by rating desc)b on a.hotel_seq = b.hotel_seq) d order by d.rating desc;

select d.* from (select a.price , a.hotel_name, a.hotel_seq, b.hotel_img, b.rating, b.hotel_addr, a.room_seq from (select min(r.price) price, h.hotel_name, r.hotel_seq, r.room_seq from hotels h join rooms r on h.hotel_seq = r.hotel_seq group by hotel_seq) a join (select round(avg(c.rating)*1,2) rating, h.hotel_seq, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_img, h.hotel_addr from hotels h join comments c join rooms r on c.room_seq = r.room_seq group by hotel_seq order by rating desc)b on a.hotel_seq = b.hotel_seq) d order by d.price;
select h.hotel_seq, r.room_type, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_info, r.price,r.room_img, r.room_seq from hotels h join rooms r on h.hotel_seq = r.hotel_seq where h.hotel_seq like #{hotel_seq};
select * from comments c join hotels h on c.room_seq = h.hotel_seq where h.hotel_seq like #{hotel_seq};
select * from hotels where hotel_area like #{hotel_area} order by hotel_seq desc;

select d.* from (select a.price , a.hotel_name, a.hotel_seq, b.hotel_img, b.rating, b.hotel_addr, b.hotel_area from (select min(r.price) price, h.hotel_name, r.hotel_seq from hotels h join rooms r on h.hotel_seq = r.hotel_seq group by hotel_seq) a join (select round(avg(c.rating)*1,2) rating, h.hotel_seq, h.hotel_name, h.hotel_img, h.hotel_addr, h.hotel_area from hotels h join comments c join rooms r on c.room_seq = h.hotel_seq = r.hotel_seq group by hotel_seq order by rating desc)b on a.hotel_seq = b.hotel_seq) d where d.hotel_area like #{hotel_area} order by rating desc;
